body:
From https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/4155#issuecomment-356553166:

> Should this advice to use `spack activate py-flake8` be added to the "Flake8 warnings" in https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/lib/spack/docs/contribution_guide.rst? I just ran into the bug in #4154 also, and eventually stumbled into this thread after trying to kludge around the problem.

Also updated the error message for Sphinx as I could no longer reproduce the bug when setuptools is not in the `PYTHONPATH`.

@goxberry
title: Add suggestion to Contribution Guide to activate flake8
